description:
Only the left can take the best country in the world and give you conditions not even seen in the third world while increasing the cost of living with inflation not seen in decades.

Why does it seem that the more money the left spends on homelessness the worse the situation gets? Because the homeless population just reached record levels and increased to 18 percent in 2024, things are not adding up.

Additionally, it’s incredible how America can somehow take on the burden of the world and house foreign nationals while slapping Americans in the face, as they are treated like second-class citizens in their own country.

REPORT: United States homelessness surges over 18% in 2024 according to federal officials.

Biden’s legacy.

The U.S. Department o
title: Biden's Legacy: Homelessness reaches new records, surges to 18% in 2024

description:
According to an MSNBC guest, Kamala Harris is the best thing since sliced bread and history will view her “legacy” as if she has done something beneficial for the American people. However, it’s unclear what she means by that considering she is responsible for some of the worst crises in American history.

NEW: MSNBC guest says Kamala Harris needs to be praised for all her accomplishments, can’t name any accomplishments besides abortion.

Remarkable.

Author Lauren Leader says Harris needs to be recognized for her “extra heavy load.”

“I hope we take a moment to acknowledge her…
title: MSNBC guest demands we "acknowledge" Kamala Harris's "extraordinary" contributions, could only name one...

description:
If you are still wearing a mask in 2024, you are mental, there is no other way to put it. And considering that even Fauci admitted all the protocols were arbitrary, at best, it’s unclear why anyone would think wearing face diapers is in one's best interest. Nonetheless, at least one hundred people in Oregon would like to signal their virtue as they parade around like they are doing anything remotely beneficial to stop the invisible sniffles.

A group of “Covid cautious” people In Oregon rented out a bowling alley, had everyone mask including the employees, set up air purifiers, and separated kids from adults.
title: Covid Lunatics Rent Out Bowling Alley To Provide A “COVID Cautious Event”

description:
Christmas Day. While drinks and merriment were being shared with family and the Kansas City Chiefs were breaking my heart both as a Bills fan and as someone playing against Mahomes and Kelce in the fantasy football championship, Netflix delivered on to us a preview of the most anticipated movie of 2025.

Happy Gilmore 2.

We've been saying this a lot since election day. But, dude: We. Are. So. Back.
title: The "Happy Gilmore 2" trailer dropped and can be summed up in four words: We Are So Back

description:
If there were a reboot of Dante's Inferno, the airport would be one of the circles of hell. Airports are worse when you are traveling during the holidays. Airports during the holidays are worse having to deal with the other people who are traveling during the holidays. Barstool Sports president Dave Portnoy found himself in his own personal inferno on Thursday.

At first, it looked like this would be a video about a crazy lady still wearing a mask in 2024. Then, the camera pans to the left.

WERE LIVING IN A SOCIETY! Dont talk on speaker phone in a crowded public space. pic.twitter.com/68wzX46tm3
— Dave Portnoy (@stoolpresidente) May 1
title: "We live in a society": Dave Portnoy speaks for all Americans when he blasts dude talking on his speakerphone at the airport
